guide: Use the best fishing rod, bait and armor that you
have access to and fish in The Park during rain.
Recommended is a Chum Rod with Angler Armor and Fish Bait.
Do your daily experiments in the Experimentation Table,
always do the highest tier you can.

note: Gain coins from the Scavenger Enchantment
guide: Kill mobs with a weapon that you have
Scavenger 3+ applied to.
Mine normal or Pure Ores in the Dwarven Mines.
You will gain passive progress in this if you
manual the Gold Collector Goal.
You will need Combat 12 for this.
Getting a Void Sword and Ender Armor
will make progress in this easier.
This requires Raw Fish Collection 5.
You should place down fishing minions
with medium storages and fuel to help with this.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels.
Use the gold from the Collection goal
to brew Absorption potions.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
Use NPC shops to buy materials for easy crafts.
Optimally you want to use a weapon with
Luck 5+ and Looting 3+ and aim for
good magic find. Grab the Century Cakes for
+1 Magic Find for 2 days.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Lumberjack's or Moil
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
You might want to grab the Bee Mask from Carnival
while its still active.
Use the best pickaxe you have access to
and enchant it. Then mine Gold in the
Dwarven Mines. The Ability Pickobolus unlocked
at Heart of the Mountain 3 might be a decent help.
Wear a full set of Ender equipment. Those drop from:
Endermen (0.5% chance), Ender Nodes (3.05% - 3.32% chance),
Obsidian Defenders (1% chance) and Watchers (1% chance).
You can find these Mobs in the Dragon's Nest in the End.
Brew an Absorption IV potion
with the Enchanted Gold from the Collector Goal
and combine it with a Glowstone.
You can get that Glowstone by buying one block
from the Builder and breaking it on your island.
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver
with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow
in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
You can also kill Endermen in The End to
get progress towards the
Enderman Slayer Community Goal.
This unlocks at 5k Diamond Collection. Use Pure Ores
in the Dwarven Mines for this. Craft it with
1 Enchanted Diamond and 8 Vines (costs 40 Jungle Leaves,
requires Jungle Wood Collection 4 to unlock it in /trades.)
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on nightlibra's, skyerzz's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress once you
talked to Bramass Beastslayer in The Spiders Den.
Collect those you run along while doing other goals.
If you have trouble check TimeDeo's fairy soul tutorial
on YouTube or use /neusouls on.
You'll unlock this recipe passively
(250 leather collection)
if you chose to do Exterminator in Barn.
Craft it with 80 Leather.
You can also use Cow Minions for this.

note: Obtain a Campfire Cultist Badge I
guide: Visit the Campfire in The Park and do
the first Trial of Fire. (10 dps over 10s)
Farm Mushroom Blocks in the Desert
with an Efficiency 5 Silk Touch 1 Gold Axe.
Obtain the needed Glowstone by buying a
Glowstone Block from the Builder and breaking
it on your island.
You will most likely get this from
leveling up skills.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
Reforge your Void Sword to Sharp
at the Blacksmith in the Hub or
enchant any weapon with Critical 5 (50 Levels).
Optimal tool:
Advanced Gardening Hoe (25 copper)
Make a full plot of Wheat (7896 seeds needed)
in The Garden (SkyBlock Level 5)
Get the seeds to plant from The Barn
or from the farm area in The Hub.
Use the best fishing rod, bait and armor that you
have access to and fish in The Park during rain.
Recommended is a Chum Rod with Angler Armor and Fish Bait.
Make sure to have Looting 3+ applied to your
weapon and rod.
You can lootshare bigger mobs like Nutcrackers on
the Winter Island for this too.
Â§cAsk before you randomly hit peoples mobs.
